article.headline: Robert Morris 90, Quinnipiac 85
article.story: HAMDEN, Conn. (AP) -- Derek Coleman scored 26 points and had four assists to lead Robert Morris to a 90-85 win over Quinnipiac on Saturday in the Northeast Conference opener for both teams. The Colonials (3-4, 1-0) rallied from a 10 points down in the second half. Coleman made 6 of 9 field goals, including 5 of 6 3-point attempts. Teammate Jeremy Chappell had 20 points, five assists and four of Robert Morris' 13 steals. Quinnipiac (4-3, 0-2) committed 26 turnovers. Robert Morris trailed 34-31 at halftime and Quinnipiac built a 48-38 lead, but the Colonials used a 10-2 run, sparked by two 3-pointers and an assist from Coleman, to pull within 50-48. Robert Morris took its first lead of the second half 63-51 on two Coleman free throws. The Colonials took the lead for good 66-64 on two Chappell free throws. Coleman scored 17 points in the second half. Victor Akinyanju led Quinnipiac with a career-high 21 points, 11 rebounds, five blocks and three steals. John Winchester had 16 points. He made four 3-pointers, including one with 10.1 seconds left to pull the Bobcats within 88-85. He was fouled but missed the free throw. Robert Morris forward A.J. Jackson added 19 points and seven rebounds, despite picking up his fourth foul less than 4 minutes into the second half. He made two free throws with 8.9 seconds left.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
